overview.en: E-commerce China will build the first of world's  blockchain e-commerce application currency. ECC will be use  to blockchain technology to complete the value distribution, commodity traceability, transaction transparency, data security, user privacy and other solutions of the e-commerce industry
overview.zh: E-Commerce China打造全球首个区块链电商应用币， ECC将利用区块链技术完成电商行业的价值分配、商品溯源、交易透明、数据安全、用户隐私等解决方案。未来将在底层搭建、加密算法和商品溯源领域为电商行业的厂商提供高效率的服务，为用户提供安全、保障的交易体验
